data.text:
Leonard Roy Kelley

Published 10:40 am Tuesday, September 12, 2017

Leonard Roy Kelley, 72, died Monday, September 11, 2017, at his home in Oxford, MS. A graveside service will be held Wednesday, September 13, 2017, at 11 a.m. at Anchor Cemetery with Reverend Gerald Shook officiating. Waller Funeral Home is in charge of arrangements.

Born in Oxford, MS, to the late John Bunyan and Ethel Virginia Turner Kelley, Mr. Kelley was a member of Anchor Baptist Church. Along with his parents, he was preceded in death by his brother, James Daniel Kelley.

He is survived by his sisters, Carmita Tidwell, Mary Metts, and Linda James, all of Oxford, MS, and Pamela Thrift, Holley Kelley and Cathy Guarr, all of Water Valley, MS and brothers, Rockey Kelley of Carriere, MS and Gary Kelley and Freddie Kelly, both of Oxford, MS.

Memorial contributions in Mr. Kelley’s memory may be made to the Anchor Baptist Church Building Fund, 1009 MS-7, Water Valley, MS 38965.
